item.description: Shares of Vishnu Prakash R Punglia touched an intraday low of Rs 66.5 today, marking a fresh 52-week and all-time low as the stock faced significant price pressure. item.title: Supreme Infrastructure India Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Supreme Infrastructure India Ltd witnessed a sharp decline on 18 Dec 2025, hitting its lower circuit limit as intense selling pressure gripped the stock. The construction sector company recorded a maximum daily loss of 5.0%, closing at ₹89.73, reflecting a day marked by panic selling and unfilled supply that weighed heavily on investor sentiment. Time: 51 minutes ago

item.title: Bhagyanagar India Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Bhagyanagar India Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Non-Ferrous Metals sector, witnessed robust market activity on 18 Dec 2025 as its stock price surged to hit the upper circuit limit. The stock closed at ₹137.58, marking a 5.0% gain on the day, driven by intense buying interest and a notable outperformance relative to its sector and benchmark indices. Time: 51 minutes ago

item.title: Sensex Edges Higher Amid Mixed Sector Performance; HDFC AMC Leads Gains
item.description: The Indian equity market displayed a cautious tone on 18 Dec 2025, with the Sensex inching up by 72.97 points to trade at 84,632.62, reflecting a modest 0.09% gain. Market breadth remained subdued as declines outnumbered advances across the BSE500, while sectoral trends showed a divergence between technology and power stocks. HDFC AMC emerged as the top large-cap gainer, underscoring selective buying interest amid mixed investor sentiment. Time: 51 minutes ago
